data.prayer: Spirit, make the church in Savanes, Côte d‘Ivoire humble and willing to hear the sometimes hard voices of prophets bringing the light of truth on them.
data.verse: So have I become your enemy by telling you the truth?

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Savanes, Côte d‘Ivoire
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, encourage the 36,081 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Savanes words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Savanes, Côte d‘Ivoire the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Father, 0.5% are known to be believers. Please, Lord call more today.
God, guide the 36,081 believers in Savanes to multiply spiritual families that love you, love each other, and make disciples.
God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 36,081 believers in Savanes, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, teach the disciples in the state of Savanes to trust your Word, like a lamp, in the darkness around them.
data.verse: your Word is a lamp for my feet, a light on my path.

location.name: Savanes
location.people_groups_list: Jeri Kuo, Senoufo,Tagwana, Fulbe, Fulani, Senoufo, Supyire, Kulango, Bouna
